question: Do you enjoy learning about software, databases, and networks?
Are you good at solving technical problems, programming, or troubleshooting?
Would you enjoy spending time developing systems, maintaining IT infrastructure, or managing data?
Do you see yourself working as a programmer, system analyst, or IT support specialist?
Do you prefer working in an environment that involves technology, innovation, and digital solutions?
Do you enjoy learning about computers, electronics, and hardware systems?
Are you good at problem-solving, coding, and understanding technical systems?
Would you enjoy spending time designing circuits, building devices, or testing systems?
Do you see yourself working as a computer engineer, hardware designer, or systems developer?
Do you prefer working in an environment that involves labs, technical projects, and engineering teamwork?
Do you enjoy learning about accounting, finance, and computerized information systems?
Are you good at solving numerical problems and working with data accuracy?
Would you enjoy spending time analyzing financial reports, auditing systems, or managing databases?
Do you see yourself working as an accountant, auditor, or financial system analyst?
Do you prefer working in an environment that involves both numbers and technology-based tools?
Which type of work sounds most interesting to you?

options.label: A
options.text: Working with software and systems to help businesses run smoothly (BSIT)

options.label: B
options.text: Creating and improving computer hardware and devices (BSCPE)

options.label: C
options.text: Handling financial data using technology to keep records accurate (BSAIS)

Do you prefer working in an environment that involves office operations, teamwork, and administrative support?
Which of the following would you most enjoy doing in your future career?

options.label: A
options.text: Creating marketing campaigns and promoting products to customers (BSBA MM)

options.label: B
options.text: Managing budgets, analyzing investments, and making financial decisions (BSBA FM)

options.label: C
options.text: Organizing recruitment, training, and employee relations in a company (BSBA HRM)

options.label: D
options.text: Launching your own business and making independent decisions as an entrepreneur (BSEntrep)

options.label: E
options.text: Handling office records, correspondence, and administrative tasks to support operations (BSOA)

question: Do you enjoy learning about hotels, restaurants, and hospitality services?
